meanings.definition: A person or thing that cycles.
meanings.sent1: The cycler rode their bike to the park.
meanings.sent2: The cycler enjoys biking on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cycler tried to cycle with their eyes closed, but quickly realized it was a bad idea.
meanings.sent4: She was a cycler of emotions, never staying in one mood for long.
meanings.sent5: The cycler's determination to finish the race was inspiring to everyone watching.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that cycles.
meanings.sent1: The cycler in the gym helped people stay fit.
meanings.sent2: The cycler at the park provided a fun workout for visitors.
meanings.sent3: The cycler machine beeped loudly when it reached the end of its cycle.
meanings.sent4: The cycler hummed along as it smoothly completed its cycle.
meanings.sent5: The cycler's display showed the progress of the workout in real-time.

meanings.definition: A participant in a cycling race.
meanings.sent1: The cycler crossed the finish line with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: The cycler trained hard to compete in the upcoming race.
meanings.sent3: The cycler accidentally took a wrong turn and ended up in a petting zoo during the race.
meanings.sent4: She was a fierce cycler, leaving her competitors in the dust.
meanings.sent5: The cycler's determination to win was evident in every pedal stroke.
